title: gIta rasikE suguNAlayE
sahitya:
gIta rasikE suguNAlayE
			(madhyamakAla)
dEvi sarasvati sadayE krSNa vENugAna rAga tALa bhAva mOha rAsa


anupallavi

  shvEta kamala jita pAda kamala shvEta vasana jita jAlE
shvEta mouktikAbharaNa jAlE munijana lOlE


caraNam    nAradamuni vinutE jnyAna varada caritE
mAra janaka hrdaya cOra kumAra citta cOra yuvatE
